Quote by GM Kynlee: http://forums.play.net/forums/GemStone%20IV/World%20Events,%20Festivals,%20and%20Storylines/Festival%20of%20the%20Fallen/view/275

Thanks to all of the input we received, we've made some adjustments that will hopefully better balance things this year. Not all of this is new, but I'm going to lay out how the arena works at this point.

When you go through the portal into the arena, ALL outside spells are stripped, and then for native casters: Retribution effect (only) of Cloak of Shadows (712) is stripped Arcane Barrier (1720), Elemental Targeting (425), and Rapid Fire (515) are stripped

Inside the arena itself: Most spells over level 10 are now allowed Implosion (720), Elemental Targeting (425), Censure (316), Judgment (1630), Nature's Fury (635), Sleep (501), Flaming Aura (1706), Spirit Servant (240) are all blocked Hiding is allowed No demons, animal companions, or Singing Sword Song (1025) No wands or embeds

Hopefully, this will help answer some of the questions you may have, and help you to prepare for killing your friends.

~~GM Kynlee~~ Elanthian Architect Breaker of Things GS4-Kynlee@play.net 3/50
